text:
<@U02HJP90QT0> so, the only thing I've done to get the HubSpot livechat is add this in the <head> section of my NextJS app:
```<script type="text/javascript" id="hs-script-loader" async defer src="//js-na1.hs-scripts.com/20786388.js" />```
Can you elaborate more on what you mean by adding this to a top-level await?
